Articles.Content: Pretty sure RealFuels is a hard requirement. Give it a try and see. The error looks like it may very well be because of RF, and tbh I wouldn't even dream of playing RO without it.
Ok Ill toss it in In that thread it says I need a engine config for it, and it links to the old overhaul thread. Could ya point me to where I can find one if I need it?
Engine configs should be all built into RO now.
Excellent! Ill spin it up now and see if she goes Thanks for the help man!

Im getting a few issues with parts in the VAB. As per picture, there are constant thrust jets comming form the taurus/orion and the parachute docking port is a bizare scale. Also the fustek station parts are out of scale and have floating nodes.

Any solutions on how to fix?

advice dog, That FX problem comes and goes, I dont' remember why, i put it back, grab it again and it's fine

The SDHI has been fixed, I caught that a bit earlier, just hasn't made it into a release yet and the FusTek is being redone at the moment, and only about half way done.

Solution: Time, it will be fixed within a day or two.

Ok! got it working! Its loaded and it looks like things are working correctly!

One more question, and it might be one for the RSS thread, how do I get the actual planets in the game, like metaphor's Cassini-Huygens mission in the imgur album over there? I would love to have a complete solar system like that

and again, thanks for helping me through this!
nice that the MM cfgs or now form one down load

ok ran into an issue installed the new RO and well all of and now ksp is stock sized
Install the latest RealFuels

EDIT: I think I figured it out

what do real fuels have to do with the loding of kerben rather then eart?

what do real fuels have to do with the loding of kerben rather then eart?

Oh Kerbin. You said stock size, I thought you meant parts. Well on that note RO doesn't have anything to do with Kerbin being Earth either.
it just seems to have happend when I installed the RO update

it just seems to have happend when I installed the RO update

Well that is all done by RSS. RO just modifies the parts to be more compatible with the resized solar system. Did you also reinstall RSS? Did you install any other add-ons that might use RSS such as Better Atmospheres or something?
it was the nut behind the keyboard some how my rss folder was gone

it was the nut behind the keyboard some how my rss folder was gone

Not sure but I think that might be your problem
